actions.text: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Langevin.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part A of House Report 113-546 to allow eligible entities to submit to the Director of the Institute of Education information regarding the number and percentage of students who are able to find employment in a field relating to their program or course of study, and would allow the Director of IES to provide technical assistance to such entities upon request.
purpose: Amendment allows eligible entities to submit to the Director of the Institute of Education information regarding the number and percentage of students who are able to find employment in a field relating to their program or course of study, and would allow the Director of IES to provide technical assistance to such entities upon request.
